title: Episode 17 - Mario Schlosser, CEO and Co-Founder, Oscar Health
description: In this discussion about the future of digital health and how to shape a profitable insurance company that still focuses on people, Mario Schlosser discusses the complex world of American health care.
dc:creator: Bloomberg
itunes:summary: In this discussion about the future of digital health and how to shape a profitable insurance company that still focuses on people, Mario Schlosser discusses the complex world of American health care.
